text: A cinematic medium shot of a person sitting in front of a microphone, actively speaking to an unseen audience. As they explain, they pick up a smartphone to hold it up for display. The background features a textured exposed brick wall, adorned with a vintage wall clock and a unique hanging light fixture consisting of several suspended light bulbs. Beneath these, a wooden shelf displays arranged photographs and memorabilia. On the desk in the immediate foreground, a desk lamp emits a faint, cool white light on the left beside a tablet, while a wire storage rack stands subtly in the back right corner. The scene has realistic lighting and high definition, optimized for dynamic camera movement.

A medium shot of a host sitting on a white chair, speaking directly to the camera. To the right, a computer desk is set up with a keyboard, mouse, speakers, and a monitor. The monitor displays a colorful screensaver featuring horizontal bands of light. In the background, a bookshelf is positioned against a plain white wall. The lower section of the shelf holds books and a small night light, while the upper section features hanging storage with headphones, a game controller, and a potted green plant. The scene has realistic lighting and depth, optimized for dynamic camera movement.

A video scene showing two men in matching burgundy suits with white gloves engaged in conversation. The setting is an elegant studio with warm lighting, featuring white armchairs with gold trim, a black sofa, and traditional Chinese artwork on the wall. One man wears glasses, while the other has distinctive hairstyle with shaved sides. The scene includes Chinese subtitles at the bottom of the screen, suggesting a formal interview or cultural discussion program with sophisticated, classic decor including wall sconces and table lamps.‚Äù
